ray.renderer

Class PathTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.renderer.DirectOnlyRenderer
      • ray.renderer.PathTracer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BruteForcePathTracer, KajiyaMediumPathTracer, KajiyaPathTracer, MIPathTracer

    public abstract class PathTracer
extends DirectOnlyRenderer
    The base class for all path tracers

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int backgroundIllumination
      1 if there is a background color 0 if there is no background color (the background is black)
      protected int depthLimit
      Depth of recursive path tracing.

    • Method Detail

      • setDepthLimit

        public void setDepthLimit(int depthLimit)
        Set the depthLimit. This function will be called by the parser to set the parameter value from scene configuration file.
        Parameters:
        depthLimit - the maximum recursive depth

      • setBackgroundIllumination

        public void setBackgroundIllumination(int backgroundIllumination)

      • rayRadiance

        public void rayRadiance(Scene scene,
                        Ray ray,
                        SampleGenerator sampler,
                        int sampleIndex,
                        Color outColor)
        Description copied from class: DirectOnlyRenderer
        Evaluates the direct illumination component (first-order component) of a radiance arriving to the camera along the given Ray.
        Specified by:
        rayRadiance in interface Renderer
        Overrides:
        rayRadiance in class DirectOnlyRenderer
        Parameters:
        scene - Scene to be rendered
        ray - the camera ray along which we compute the radiance
        sampler - The sampler is used to generate random numbers for sampling rays
        sampleIndex - index of the currently sampled ray in a pixel. The index value will be used in SampleGenerator.sample(int, int, Point2) method.
        outColor - output radiance for each RGB channel

      • rayRadianceRecursive

        protected abstract void rayRadianceRecursive(Scene scene,
                                             Ray ray,
                                             SampleGenerator sampler,
                                             int sampleIndex,
                                             int level,
                                             Color outColor)

      • gatherIllumination

        public void gatherIllumination(Scene scene,
                               Vector3 outDir,
                               IntersectionRecord iRec,
                               SampleGenerator sampler,
                               int sampleIndex,
                               int level,
                               Color outColor)
        Evaluates a Monte Carlo estimate of reflected radiance due to direct and/or indirect illumination.
        Parameters:
        scene - scene to be rendered
        outDir - output direction of the light
        iRec - information about the intersection points
        sampler - the sampler is used to generate random numbers for sampling rays
        sampleIndex - index of the currently sampled ray in a pixel. The index value will be used in SampleGenerator.sample(int, int, Point2) method.
        level - current recursive depth
        outColor - output radiance for each RGB channel

      • gatherScattering

        public void gatherScattering(Scene scene,
                             Vector3 outDir,
                             MediumSamplingRecord mRec,
                             SampleGenerator sampler,
                             int sampleIndex,
                             int level,
                             Color outColor)
